name: git-repo-browser
description: A local web application that dynamically displays Git repository file structures in a clean, collapsible tree view interface

scripts.start: echo 'Open index.html in your browser to start using the Git Repository Browser'
scripts.test: node repo-scan.js . && echo '✅ Scanner test passed'
scripts.status: ls -la && echo 'Repository structure file exists:' && test -f repo-structure.json && echo '✅ repo-structure.json found' || echo '❌ repo-structure.json not found'

author: Git Repository Browser
